recipes.name: Snowball cookies
ingredients: 2 tbsp icing sugar, plus extra for dusting

recipes.name: Chicory cups with avocado & pink grapefruit salsa
ingredients: 1 red chilli,  finely chopped (deseeded, if you like)

recipes.name: Orange, cranberry & pistachio pavlova
ingredients: large handful of pistachios, roughly chopped

recipes.name: Oregano roasties
ingredients: 1.5kg Maris Piper or  King Edward potatoes, halved or quartered if large
small bunch of oregano, leaves picked

recipes.name: Pomegranate & chestnut sprouts
ingredients: handful of pomegranate seeds, to serve

recipes.name: Dukkah parsnips
ingredients: 1kg parsnips, peeled and cut into rough wedges

recipes.name: Celeriac dauphinoise
ingredients: olive oil, for the baking dish
1 large celeriac, peeled and thinly sliced using a mandoline or sharp knife

recipes.name: Vegan terrine
ingredients: handful of oregano, leaves picked and chopped
toast and a balsamic-dressed salad, to serve

recipes.name: Chimichurri sauce
ingredients: small bunch of coriander, finely chopped
small bunch of flat-leaf parsley, chopped
1 green chilli (or red chilli), deseeded and finely chopped
2 tbsp red wine vinegar (or white, if you prefer)
